definition: born at the wrong time (idiom); unlucky (esp. to complain about one's fate)/born under an unlucky star/ahead of his time

definition: lit. when a man achieves the Dao, his poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom)/fig. to ride on sb else's success/Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too/Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it
pinyin: yi1 ren2 de2 dao4 , ji1 quan3 sheng1 tian1

definition: Time makes the man (idiom). The trend of events brings forth the hero.

pinyin: cheng2 men2 shi1 huo3 , yang1 ji2 chi2 yu2

definition: if you live a life of crime, sooner or later you'll pay for it

definition: to lose at sunrise but gain at sunset (idiom)/to compensate later for one's earlier loss/what you lose on the swings you gain on the roundabouts
pinyin: shi1 zhi1 dong1 yu2 , shou1 zhi1 sang1 yu2

definition: the river flows thirty years to the East, thirty years to the West (proverb)/change is the only constant

related.word: 三十年河东，三十年河西

definition: No flower can bloom for a hundred days./Good times do not last long. (idiom)
